menuItem1.name: Beef Stroganoff
menuItem1.description: Classic Russian dish with an Asian flare. Finely sliced beef fillet, onions and mushrooms, all sautéed in white wine and sour cream, served over a bed of rice noodles.

menuItem2.name: Crêpe le Blini
menuItem2.description: Russian pancakes meet French crêpes. Light and sweet, these make the perfect end to your meal!

menuItem3.name: Bratwurst Stir-Fry
menuItem3.description: Pan seared bratwurst with traditional Asian vegetables over a bed of jasmin rice.

menuItem4.name: Rouleaux de Printemps
menuItem4.description: Dessert or apéritif? Hard to decide with this Vietnamese gỏi cuốn wrapped in Pâte sucrée.
